m:MaterialTitle.title: Alignment
m:MaterialTitle.description: Vertical Align - You can easily vertically center things by adding the class valign-wrapper to the container holding the items you want to vertically align.

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialPanel addStyleNames="valign-wrapper {style.panel}">
<m:MaterialLabel fontSize="2em" addStyleNames="valign center {style.title}" text="This should be vertically aligned"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.description: Text Align - These classes are for horizontally aligning content. Just add textAlign='CENTER, LEFT OR RIGHT' to any material widget

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialTitle description="Text Align - These classes are for horizontally aligning content. We have .left-align, .right-align and .center-align"/>
<m:MaterialPanel textAlign="LEFT" addStyleNames="{style.item}">
<m:MaterialLabel fontSize="1.5em" text="This should be left aligned"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
<m:MaterialPanel textAlign="CENTER" addStyleNames="{style.item}">
<m:MaterialLabel fontSize="1.5em" text="This should be center aligned"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
<m:MaterialPanel textAlign="RIGHT" addStyleNames="{style.item}">
<m:MaterialLabel fontSize="1.5em" text="This should be right aligned"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Float
m:MaterialTitle.description: Quick Floats - Quickly float things by adding float='RIGHT , LEFT, or NONE' to any material components.

m:MaterialTitle.title: hideOn
m:MaterialTitle.description: We provide easy to use classes to hide content on specific screen sizes. Just add hideOn='HIDE_ON_SMALL...' to any material components;

tr.td: Hidden for Mobile Only and Below

m:MaterialTitle.title: showOn
m:MaterialTitle.description: We provide easy to use classes to show content on specific screen sizes. Just add showOn='SHOW_ON_LARGE...' to any material components;

m:MaterialTitle.title: Formatting
m:MaterialTitle.description: These classes help format various content on your site.
Truncation - To truncate long lines of text in an ellipsis, add the class truncate to the tag which contains the text. See an exaple below of a header being truncated inside a card.

m:MaterialLabel.text: This is an extremely long title that will be truncated

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre: <m:MaterialPanel shadow="1"> <m:MaterialLabel text="This is an extremely long title that will be truncated" addStyleNames="truncate" fontSize="2.5em"/> </m:MaterialPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Hoverable
m:MaterialTitle.description: The hoverable is a hover class that adds an animation for box shadow as seen below. It can be used on most elements, but meant for use on cards.
